headline: Is It Time To Reassess Iron Mountain (IRM) After Recent Share Price Weakness?
summary: If you are wondering whether Iron Mountain's current share price reflects its true worth, you are not alone. This article is designed to help you size up that value question clearly. The stock recently closed at US$93.84, with returns of 14.5% over the last 30 days and 12.7% year to date. The 7 day return is a 2.2% decline and the 1 year return is a 6.5% decline, set against a 3 year return of 91.6% and a 5 year return that is roughly 2.5x. Recent coverage has focused on Iron Mountain's role...
